channel.title: Events and Activities on Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society
channel.description: Recent content in Events and Activities on Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register Attendee List We look forward to seeing everyone at the event.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register Dinner There will be a group dinner in the evening from 18:30 to 21:00 at a nearby restaurant within easy walking distance of the main venue.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register CUARS will be hosting a meeting of the UK Microwave Group on Saturday March 16, 2019 at our campus in Cardiff.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register March 16, 2019 Time Event Description 10:30 Welcome 10:40 Talk 1 11:30 Talk 2 Digital Pre-Distortion 12:10 Break Measurements, project demos, etc 12:30 Lunch Buffet at the University 13:30 Talk 3 Amateur Television on the Microwave Bands 14:10 Talk 4 14:50 Break 15:15 Talk 5 RF Power Amplifier Design Considerations 15:55 Talk 6 Advanced High Efficiency PAs 16:35 Break 16:50 Talk 7 17:30 Closing remarks 18:30 - 21:00 Dinner Talks Digital Pre-Distortion: Introduction and use Derek Kozel - MW0LNA

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register Registration We request that you pre-register so we can accurately judge the amount of food and beverages to have on hand and so we can reserve enough space at dinner.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register Venue The Roundtable is being held in the West and South Queen’s Buildings of Cardiff University’s engineering department.
